// ================================================================= // Program: LangZh - the content of all web pages in Chinese // Author : Bill Huang // Date : Oct 19 - Dec 18, 2019 // ================================================================= const zh_CN = { hello: "你好！", // 官网 // ==== // 官网头部内容 ft_header_fantuan: "饭团", ft_header_about: "关于我们", ft_header_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_header_career: "招聘频道", ft_header_language: "English", // Footer of the office website ft_footer_ftdelivery: "饭团外卖", ft_footer_ftdianping: "饭团点评", ft_footer_aboutus: "关于我们", ft_footer_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_footer_careers: "招聘频道", ft_footer_contactus: "联系我们", ft_footer_policy: "隐私政策", ft_footer_partner: "商家合作", ft_footer_driver: "成为送餐员", ft_footer_suggest: "如果您有任何意见或建议，请发送邮件至", // Office website - about // ---------------------- // about ft_about_best_p1: "轻松生活", ft_about_best_p2: "一个饭团", ft_about_best_p3: "就够了！", ft_about_best_btn: "访问网站", // about fantuan ft_about_fantuan_title: "关于饭团", ft_about_fantuan_text: "饭团是一家北美互联网生活服务公司，旗下业务包括饭团外卖、饭团点评、饭团跑腿等，结合中式优质服务与北美先进大数据技术，以互联网思维推动生活服务行业变革。 目前，饭团已覆盖温哥华、多伦多、卡尔加里、蒙特利尔，西雅图，洛杉矶，纽约等加拿大及美国主要城市，为海外华人乃至所有海外消费者提供更加便捷、高效、智能的生活服务。", // history ft_about_history_title: "饭团大事记", ft_about_history_year0: "2014年11月", ft_about_history_title0: "饭团成立", ft_about_history_text0: "饭团于2014年成立于加拿大温哥华，并于温哥华设立总部", ft_about_history_text01: "I'm an amazing optional text", ft_about_history_year1: "2016年9月", ft_about_history_title1: "进军多伦多", ft_about_history_text1: "饭团开拓的第一个温哥华以外的城市，迅速占领当地市场，增长强劲", ft_about_history_year2: "2017年4月", ft_about_history_title2: "自提业务上线", ft_about_history_text2: "自提业务无需小费及送餐费，用户可以通过饭团软件下单，前往餐厅自取", ft_about_history_year3: "2018年9月", ft_about_history_title3: "点评业务上线", ft_about_history_text3: "本地领先的基于餐饮商户信息与交易的独立第三方点评消费平台", ft_about_history_year4: "2018年12月", ft_about_history_title4: "首轮融资", ft_about_history_text4: "饭团于2018年成功融资，获得知名硅谷投资机构注资", ft_about_history_year5: "2019年", ft_about_history_title5: "进军西雅图", ft_about_history_text5: "饭团正式进军美国市场，第一站选择了距离温哥华百公里外的西雅图", ft_about_history_title6: "进军洛杉矶和纽约", ft_about_history_text6: "饭团在西雅图取得成功后迅速进入洛杉矶和纽约地区，首先覆盖尔湾和法拉盛地区，随后进一步实现全城覆盖", ft_about_history_title7: "英文版本上线", ft_about_history_text7: "饭团首先在温哥华地区上线全英文版本，非华人群体也可以享受到饭团优质的服务", // contact us ft_about_contactus_title: "联系我们", ft_about_contactus_text: "饭团现已入驻美加各大主流城市，欢迎联络当地办公室垂询详情。", ft_about_contactus_country1: "加拿大", ft_about_contactus_country2: "美国", // Office website - newsroom // ------------------------- // newsroom ft_news_title: "饭团新闻", ft_news_contact: "广告信息，请联系我们 pr@fantuan.ca", ft_news_viewmore: "更多新闻", ft_news_path_home: "饭团", ft_news_path_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_news_path_newsdetail: "新闻内容", // Delivery (外卖) - header & footer // ================================ // Header of the delivery fd_header_partner: "商家合作", fd_header_deliver: "送餐员", fd_header_language: "English", // Footer of the delivery fd_footer_dianping: "饭团点评", fd_footer_aboutus: "关于我们", fd_footer_newsroom: "饭团新闻", fd_footer_career: "招聘频道", fd_footer_contactus: "联系我们", fd_footer_faq: "疑问解答", fd_footer_policy: "隐私政策", fd_footer_partner: "商家合作", fd_footer_driver: "成为送餐员", fd_footer_suggest: "如果您有任何意见或建议，请发送邮件至", // Delivery - Partner // ------------------ // Partner with Fantuan fd_partner_with_header: "商家合作", fd_partner_with_text: "商家可下载饭团商家端软件。通过软件一键接单，免去繁琐电话接单，节省人力。商家更可查看订单详情，了解菜品销量，优化餐厅运营。", fd_partner_with_button: "我要入驻", // More customer fd_partner_more_title1: "为商户带来更多客户", fd_partner_more_text1: "饭团平台用户粘性大，消费能力强，平台亦能帮助商家突破地理位置的局限，扩大客源。", fd_partner_more_title2: "无额外成本", fd_partner_more_text2: "合作方式简易无额外成本，饭团专业的工作人员上门服务。入驻饭团即可立即享受平台的流量优势。", fd_partner_more_title3: "提升餐厅经营效率", fd_partner_more_text3: "软件接单及专业的饭团客服团队为商户节省成本，饭团的高单量能显著提高厨房利用率，亦无需雇佣额外的送餐人员。", fd_partner_more_title4: "协助餐厅实现高速增长及扩张", fd_partner_more_text4: "饭团庞大用户群为餐厅带来额外的线上外卖订单，为商户带来可观的收益，亦可导流线上外卖至线下消费。", // Count up fd_partner_countup_title1: "注册用户", fd_partner_countup_text1: "active online users", fd_partner_countup_title2: "合作商户", fd_partner_countup_text2: "partner restaurants", fd_partner_countup_title3: "送餐员", fd_partner_countup_text3: "delivery staff", // 4steps fd_partner_4steps_title: "免去繁琐流程，共享百万流量", fd_partner_4steps_text: "商家入驻饭团能迅速建立起良好的品牌形象和市场知名度，销售收入迅速增长。", fd_partner_4steps_title1: "联系饭团", fd_partner_4steps_text1: "在线提交申请，我们将有专业的市场人员联系您", fd_partner_4steps_title2: "签订合约", fd_partner_4steps_text2: "市场人员到店与您签署专属合约，保障您的最大利益", fd_partner_4steps_title3: "安装平板", fd_partner_4steps_text3: "来单自动提示，店内一键接单，后台数据一目了然", fd_partner_4steps_title4: "线上运营", fd_partner_4steps_text4: "轻松使用后台管理菜单，线上曝光渠道带来更多客人", fd_partner_4steps_start: "开始合作", fd_partner_4steps_button: "Join Now", // advert fd_partner_advert_title: "广告合作", fd_partner_advert_text: "饭团依托大平台优势，帮您精准定位客户群。饭团各类广告位是增加品牌知名度最直接有效的方式。广告位包括餐饮和非餐饮类别，您可以点击下载广告资料，或点击立即申请填写联络方式，我们将有专人联系您。", fd_partner_advert_button1: "立即申请", fd_partner_advert_button2: "广告资料", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Partner // ------------------------------------- fd_partner_become_button: "我要入驻", fd_partner_become_title: "成为商户", fd_partner_become_area: "地区", fd_partner_become_area_select1: "温哥华地区", fd_partner_become_area_select2: "洛杉矶地区", fd_partner_become_area_select3: "多伦多地区", fd_partner_become_name: "姓名", fd_partner_become_name_ph1: "名", fd_partner_become_name_ph2: "姓", fd_partner_become_phone: "电话", fd_partner_become_phone_ph: "电话号码", fd_partner_become_email: "邮箱", fd_partner_become_email_ph: "邮箱地址", fd_partner_become_busname: "商户名称", fd_partner_become_busname_ph: "商户名称", fd_partner_become_busadr: "商户地址", fd_partner_become_busadr_street: "街道名", fd_partner_become_busadr_city: "城市", fd_partner_become_busadr_zip: "邮政编码", fd_partner_become_buscat: "商户类别", fd_partner_become_buscat_ph: "商户类别", fd_partner_become_desc: "商户描述", fd_partner_become_inputcode: "输入验证码", fd_partner_become_submit: "提交", fd_partner_become_close: "关闭", fd_partner_become_ver_notclear: "不清楚", fd_partner_become_ver_change: "点击更换", // Delivery - Deliver // ------------------ // Deliver flexible fd_deliver_flexible_p1: "时间灵活", fd_deliver_flexible_p2: "收入高", fd_deliver_flexible_p3: "自由选择上班时间，日赚$200不是梦。", fd_deliver_best_button: "立即申请", // Why deliver with Fantuan fd_deliver_why_header: "为什么成为饭团送餐员？", fd_deliver_why_text: "想要收入高？还想工作时间自由？成为饭团外卖送餐员就能满足您的需求！", fd_deliver_why_header1: "时间灵活", fd_deliver_why_text1: "自由选择上班时间，周一至周日随心选", fd_deliver_why_header2: "收入高", fd_deliver_why_text2: "海量订单，轻松通过软件接单，收入明细一目了然", fd_deliver_why_header3: "自选配送工具", fd_deliver_why_text3: "只需工卡，驾照和车辆，可选汽车或电动车，即可开始您的配送之旅。", // deliver meet fd_deliver_meet_header: "优秀送餐员介绍", fd_deliver_meet_text: "Life can be complicated but ordering food doesn't have to be.", // deliver get start fd_deliver_get_header: "立即申请", fd_deliver_get_text1: "时间灵活，轻松赚钱！填写表格立刻申请成为饭团", fd_deliver_get_text2: "送餐员，期待您的加入！", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Deliver // ------------------------------------- fd_deliver_become_button: "我要入驻", fd_deliver_become_title: "成为送餐员", fd_deliver_become_area: "地区", fd_deliver_become_area_select1: "Greater Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_area_select2: "Los Angeles", fd_deliver_become_area_select3: "Toronto", fd_deliver_become_name: "姓名", fd_deliver_become_name_ph1: "First Name", fd_deliver_become_name_ph2: "Last Name", fd_deliver_become_phone: "电话", fd_deliver_become_phone_ph: "Phone Number", fd_deliver_become_address: "地址", fd_deliver_become_address_street: "Street Address", fd_deliver_become_address_city: "City", fd_deliver_become_address_zip: "ZIP / Postal Code", fd_deliver_become_schedule_title: "服务区域", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name1: "大都市", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name2: "拉菲德", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name3: "市中心", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name4: "新西部", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name5: "海斯汀", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name6: "列治文", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name7: "Coquitlam", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name8: "Surrey", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name9: "Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_trans_title: "交通工具", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Car (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Electric Motorbike (rent)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Motorbike (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_hours_title: "送餐时间", fd_deliver_become_hours_time01: "周一 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time02: "周二 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time03: "周三 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time04: "周四 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time05: "周五 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time06: "周六 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time07: "周日 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time08: "周一 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time09: "周二 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time10: "周三 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time11: "周四 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time12: "周五 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time13: "周六 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time14: "周日 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_desc: "申请描述", fd_deliver_become_inputcode: "输入验证码", fd_deliver_become_submit: "提交", fd_deliver_become_close: "关闭", // Delivery - FAQ // -------------- // FAQ fd_faq_header: "FAQ", fd_faq_text: "还有疑问？我们为您解答！我们列出了常见的一些问题，请在下方查找相应信息。如未能解答您的疑问，请联络当地饭团工作人员。", // FAQ general fd_faq_general_title: "一般性问题", fd_faq_general_h1: "1、如何联系客服解决问题？", fd_faq_general_p1: "联系客服，请拨打电话778-833-1131，客服周一至周日全天在线，24小时都有专人解决您的问题。", fd_faq_general_h2: "2、哪些商家有优惠？都有些什么优惠？", fd_faq_general_p2: "优惠信息可以在饭团点餐主页查看，也可以关注各区公众号了解最新优惠活动。", fd_faq_general_h3: "3、预计送达的时间为什么与我实际收餐的时间不符？", fd_faq_general_p3: "饭团平均配送时间为30分钟左右，影响配送速度的不确定因素主要有：", fd_faq_general_p31: "1）订单排队受理：我们需按下单的先后次序安排您的订单；", fd_faq_general_p32: "2）商家出餐速度：因某些餐品的制作特性，餐品的数量多，偶尔会有非常长时间的等餐过程；餐馆一般需要20分钟以上的时间。", fd_faq_general_p33: "3）恶劣天气：特殊天气时行车环境恶化，导致配送效率下降；", fd_faq_general_p34: "4）配送意外：偶尔路上会发生撞车，修路，堵车等原因导致配送时间增长。", fd_faq_general_p35: "我们无法掌握所有因素，希望能得到您的谅解和支持。提前下单或预订，将有效地保障您的用餐时间要求。

", fd_faq_general_h4: "4、送过来的餐品有问题怎么解决？", fd_faq_general_p4: "如遇餐品有任何问题请及时联系通知客服处理， 通常分为两种情况，若是送餐服务过程中产生的问题则由饭团进行赔偿协商，例如餐品洒漏严重。 若是餐品质量出现问题，客服会帮助您联系商家进行协商或赔偿处理。", fd_faq_general_h5: "5、饭团提供发票吗？", fd_faq_general_p5: "如需订单的发票/收据，可以在历史订单里找到需要发票/收据的订单，点开之后会看到一个需要小票的字样 ，选择并填写您的邮箱，小票就会直接发送到指定邮箱。", // FAQ account fd_faq_account_title: "账号", // fd_faq_account_h1: "", // fd_faq_account_p1: "", // FAQ delivery staff fd_faq_deliver_title: "送餐员", fd_faq_deliver_h1: "1、如何成为饭团送餐员？", fd_faq_deliver_p1: "成为饭团送餐员请前往http://xxxxx填写申请。", fd_faq_deliver_h2: "2、在饭团送餐是用什么交通工具？需要自备吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p2: "饭团送餐员需要自备交通工具，汽车，自行车，电单车均可。您也可以租赁饭团提供的电单车。", fd_faq_deliver_h3: "3、在饭团送餐需要工卡吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p3: "需要，必须有合法工卡和sin number才能成为饭团送餐员。", fd_faq_deliver_h4: "4、我是国际学生，可以成为饭团送餐员吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p4: "只要有有效工签，工卡和sin number即可成为饭团送餐员。", // FAQ refunds fd_faq_refunds_title: "退款", fd_faq_refunds_h1: "1、如何查看我的退款？", fd_faq_refunds_p1: "退款方式具体以银行的结算方式为准，您可以查询银行的消费记录，根据银行不同退款方式会有不同，有的银行会给您退款，有的会直接在之前的订单金额上做修正。", fd_faq_refunds_h2: "2、退还的优惠券使用期限是多久？", fd_faq_refunds_p2: "退还的优惠券有效期为发放当日起计一年有效。", // FAQ partner fd_faq_partner_title: "商家", fd_faq_partner_h1: "1、如何入驻饭团平台？", fd_faq_partner_p1: "商家入驻请前往http:xxxxx填写申请，您也可以拨打相应城市市场部门电话。", fd_faq_partner_h2: "2、签约后是否有专人解答我的问题？", fd_faq_partner_p2: "我们会有专门负责餐厅合作以及市场运营的同事与餐厅联系，为餐厅解答所有的问题。后期也会与餐厅保持联系，任何问题都可以随时沟通。", fd_faq_partner_h3: "3、如何参与平台的优惠活动？", fd_faq_partner_p3: "饭团每月都会有相应的线上或者线下的活动。活动种类不限。若想要参与饭团的活动，只需找到负责您区域的市场运营同事询问即可。", // FAQ payment fd_faq_payment_title: "支付", fd_faq_payment_h1: "1、饭团支持哪些支付方式？", fd_faq_payment_p1: "饭团接受以下支付方式：", fd_faq_payment_p11: "- 现金", fd_faq_payment_p12: "- interac online可以支持debit card在线支付", fd_faq_payment_p13: "- 在线支付，接受visa卡, master卡", fd_faq_payment_p14: "- 微信支付", fd_faq_payment_p15: "- 支付宝（仅限饭团App内使用）", fd_faq_payment_h2: "2、Debit卡为什么总是无法成功支付？", fd_faq_payment_p2: "请确认您的卡上是否有Visa或MasterCard字样，如果有的话需要选择Visa/Mastercard支付方式。", // FAQ membership points fd_faq_member_title: "会员积分", fd_faq_member_h1: "1、会员积分怎么得到？", fd_faq_member_p1: "1）成功下单后，即可获得与点餐金额相等的积分；", fd_faq_member_p11: "2）进入点餐界面右下角点击“账户”，选择“赚积分”获取相应积分；", fd_faq_member_p12: "3）进入饭团点评写下餐厅点评亦可获得相应积分", fd_faq_member_h2: "2、积分有什么用？", fd_faq_member_p2: "进入点餐界面点击右下角“账户”，选择“积分”即可以相应积分兑换积分商城的礼品。", // Dianping (点评) // ============== // header of dianping dp_header_partner: "商务合作", dp_header_foodinfo: "美食资讯", dp_header_language: "English", // Footer of dianping dp_footer_fantuan: "饭团集团", dp_footer_ftdelivery: "饭团外卖", dp_footer_aboutus: "关于我们", dp_footer_newsroom: "饭团新闻", dp_footer_careers: "招聘频道", dp_footer_foodnews: "美食文章", dp_footer_partner: "商家合作", dp_footer_contactus: "Contact Us", dp_footer_policy: "服务条款" }; export default zh_CN;

sourcesContent:
// ================================================================= // Program: LangZh - the content of all web pages in Chinese // Author : Bill Huang // Date : Oct 19 - Dec 18, 2019 // ================================================================= const zh_CN = { hello: "你好！", // 官网 // ==== // 官网头部内容 ft_header_fantuan: "饭团", ft_header_about: "关于我们", ft_header_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_header_career: "招聘频道", ft_header_language: "English", // Footer of the office website ft_footer_ftdelivery: "饭团外卖", ft_footer_ftdianping: "饭团点评", ft_footer_aboutus: "关于我们", ft_footer_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_footer_careers: "招聘频道", ft_footer_contactus: "联系我们", ft_footer_policy: "隐私政策", ft_footer_partner: "商家合作", ft_footer_driver: "成为送餐员", ft_footer_suggest: "如果您有任何意见或建议，请发送邮件至", // Office website - about // ---------------------- // about ft_about_best_p1: "轻松生活", ft_about_best_p2: "一个饭团", ft_about_best_p3: "就够了！", ft_about_best_btn: "访问网站", // about fantuan ft_about_fantuan_title: "关于饭团", ft_about_fantuan_text: "饭团是一家北美互联网生活服务公司，旗下业务包括饭团外卖、饭团点评、饭团跑腿等，结合中式优质服务与北美先进大数据技术，以互联网思维推动生活服务行业变革。 目前，饭团已覆盖温哥华、多伦多、卡尔加里、蒙特利尔，西雅图，洛杉矶，纽约等加拿大及美国主要城市，为海外华人乃至所有海外消费者提供更加便捷、高效、智能的生活服务。", // history ft_about_history_title: "饭团大事记", ft_about_history_year0: "2014年11月", ft_about_history_title0: "饭团成立", ft_about_history_text0: "饭团于2014年成立于加拿大温哥华，并于温哥华设立总部", ft_about_history_text01: "I'm an amazing optional text", ft_about_history_year1: "2016年9月", ft_about_history_title1: "进军多伦多", ft_about_history_text1: "饭团开拓的第一个温哥华以外的城市，迅速占领当地市场，增长强劲", ft_about_history_year2: "2017年4月", ft_about_history_title2: "自提业务上线", ft_about_history_text2: "自提业务无需小费及送餐费，用户可以通过饭团软件下单，前往餐厅自取", ft_about_history_year3: "2018年9月", ft_about_history_title3: "点评业务上线", ft_about_history_text3: "本地领先的基于餐饮商户信息与交易的独立第三方点评消费平台", ft_about_history_year4: "2018年12月", ft_about_history_title4: "首轮融资", ft_about_history_text4: "饭团于2018年成功融资，获得知名硅谷投资机构注资", ft_about_history_year5: "2019年", ft_about_history_title5: "进军西雅图", ft_about_history_text5: "饭团正式进军美国市场，第一站选择了距离温哥华百公里外的西雅图", ft_about_history_title6: "进军洛杉矶和纽约", ft_about_history_text6: "饭团在西雅图取得成功后迅速进入洛杉矶和纽约地区，首先覆盖尔湾和法拉盛地区，随后进一步实现全城覆盖", ft_about_history_title7: "英文版本上线", ft_about_history_text7: "饭团首先在温哥华地区上线全英文版本，非华人群体也可以享受到饭团优质的服务", // contact us ft_about_contactus_title: "联系我们", ft_about_contactus_text: "饭团现已入驻美加各大主流城市，欢迎联络当地办公室垂询详情。", ft_about_contactus_country1: "加拿大", ft_about_contactus_country2: "美国", // Office website - newsroom // ------------------------- // newsroom ft_news_title: "饭团新闻", ft_news_contact: "广告信息，请联系我们 pr@fantuan.ca", ft_news_viewmore: "更多新闻", ft_news_path_home: "饭团", ft_news_path_newsroom: "饭团新闻", ft_news_path_newsdetail: "新闻内容", // Delivery (外卖) - header & footer // ================================ // Header of the delivery fd_header_partner: "商家合作", fd_header_deliver: "送餐员", fd_header_language: "English", // Footer of the delivery fd_footer_dianping: "饭团点评", fd_footer_aboutus: "关于我们", fd_footer_newsroom: "饭团新闻", fd_footer_career: "招聘频道", fd_footer_contactus: "联系我们", fd_footer_faq: "疑问解答", fd_footer_policy: "隐私政策", fd_footer_partner: "商家合作", fd_footer_driver: "成为送餐员", fd_footer_suggest: "如果您有任何意见或建议，请发送邮件至", // Delivery - Home // --------------- fd_home_best_p1: "肚子饿", fd_home_best_p2: "就用饭团", fd_home_best_p3: "外卖！", fd_home_best_button1: "下载 App", fd_home_best_button2: "商家合作", fd_home_best_button3: "成为送餐员", // Our service // refer in the files in delivery/data/DeliveryHome.about_us_carousel_data.js and // delivery/data/DeliveryHome.about_us_carousel_data_zh.js // 饭团优势 fd_home_our_header: "饭团优势", fd_home_our_text: "饭团外卖现已覆盖美国及加拿大超过15个城市，积累近4000家优质商家，拥有超过35万用户，是北美最大的亚洲美食外卖平台。", fd_home_our_header1: "火速配送", fd_home_our_text1: "3000+送餐员团队保障送餐效率", fd_home_our_header2: "实时状态", fd_home_our_text2: "即时通知您订单的配送状态及距离", fd_home_our_header3: "多样付款方式", fd_home_our_text3: "支持Visa/Master/Debit/支付宝/微信支付/现金", // Our App fd_home_ourapp_header: "下载App", fd_home_ourapp_text1: "美食宝典，必不可少，轻松生活，从饭团外卖开始！", fd_home_ourapp_text2: "新用户立享$18大红包，赶快下载吧！", // With Fantuan fd_home_with_header1: "商家合作", fd_home_with_text1: "为您的餐厅带来更多客人和盈利", fd_home_with_header2: "成为送餐员", fd_home_with_text2: "时间灵活，收入高", // Delivery - Partner // ------------------ // Partner with Fantuan fd_partner_with_header: "商家合作", fd_partner_with_text: "商家可下载饭团商家端软件。通过软件一键接单，免去繁琐电话接单，节省人力。商家更可查看订单详情，了解菜品销量，优化餐厅运营。", fd_partner_with_button: "我要入驻", // More customer fd_partner_more_title1: "为商户带来更多客户", fd_partner_more_text1: "饭团平台用户粘性大，消费能力强，平台亦能帮助商家突破地理位置的局限，扩大客源。", fd_partner_more_title2: "无额外成本", fd_partner_more_text2: "合作方式简易无额外成本，饭团专业的工作人员上门服务。入驻饭团即可立即享受平台的流量优势。", fd_partner_more_title3: "提升餐厅经营效率", fd_partner_more_text3: "软件接单及专业的饭团客服团队为商户节省成本，饭团的高单量能显著提高厨房利用率，亦无需雇佣额外的送餐人员。", fd_partner_more_title4: "协助餐厅实现高速增长及扩张", fd_partner_more_text4: "饭团庞大用户群为餐厅带来额外的线上外卖订单，为商户带来可观的收益，亦可导流线上外卖至线下消费。", // Count up fd_partner_countup_title1: "注册用户", fd_partner_countup_text1: "active online users", fd_partner_countup_title2: "合作商户", fd_partner_countup_text2: "partner restaurants", fd_partner_countup_title3: "送餐员", fd_partner_countup_text3: "delivery staff", // 4steps fd_partner_4steps_title: "免去繁琐流程，共享百万流量", fd_partner_4steps_text: "商家入驻饭团能迅速建立起良好的品牌形象和市场知名度，销售收入迅速增长。", fd_partner_4steps_title1: "联系饭团", fd_partner_4steps_text1: "在线提交申请，我们将有专业的市场人员联系您", fd_partner_4steps_title2: "签订合约", fd_partner_4steps_text2: "市场人员到店与您签署专属合约，保障您的最大利益", fd_partner_4steps_title3: "安装平板", fd_partner_4steps_text3: "来单自动提示，店内一键接单，后台数据一目了然", fd_partner_4steps_title4: "线上运营", fd_partner_4steps_text4: "轻松使用后台管理菜单，线上曝光渠道带来更多客人", fd_partner_4steps_start: "开始合作", fd_partner_4steps_button: "Join Now", // advert fd_partner_advert_title: "广告合作", fd_partner_advert_text: "饭团依托大平台优势，帮您精准定位客户群。饭团各类广告位是增加品牌知名度最直接有效的方式。广告位包括餐饮和非餐饮类别，您可以点击下载广告资料，或点击立即申请填写联络方式，我们将有专人联系您。", fd_partner_advert_button1: "立即申请", fd_partner_advert_button2: "广告资料", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Partner // ------------------------------------- fd_partner_become_button: "我要入驻", fd_partner_become_title: "成为商户", fd_partner_become_area: "地区", fd_partner_become_area_select1: "温哥华地区", fd_partner_become_area_select2: "洛杉矶地区", fd_partner_become_area_select3: "多伦多地区", fd_partner_become_name: "姓名", fd_partner_become_name_ph1: "名", fd_partner_become_name_ph2: "姓", fd_partner_become_phone: "电话", fd_partner_become_phone_ph: "电话号码", fd_partner_become_email: "邮箱", fd_partner_become_email_ph: "邮箱地址", fd_partner_become_busname: "商户名称", fd_partner_become_busname_ph: "商户名称", fd_partner_become_busadr: "商户地址", fd_partner_become_busadr_street: "街道名", fd_partner_become_busadr_city: "城市", fd_partner_become_busadr_zip: "邮政编码", fd_partner_become_buscat: "商户类别", fd_partner_become_buscat_ph: "商户类别", fd_partner_become_desc: "商户描述", fd_partner_become_inputcode: "输入验证码", fd_partner_become_submit: "提交", fd_partner_become_close: "关闭", fd_partner_become_ver_notclear: "不清楚", fd_partner_become_ver_change: "点击更换", // Delivery - Partner - advertise contact // -------------------------------------- fd_partner_become_advert_button: "立即入驻", fd_partner_become_advert_title: "广告合作", fd_partner_become_advert_close: "关闭", // Delivery - Deliver // ------------------ // Deliver flexible fd_deliver_flexible_p1: "时间灵活", fd_deliver_flexible_p2: "收入高", fd_deliver_flexible_p3: "自由选择上班时间，日赚$200不是梦。", fd_deliver_best_button: "立即申请", // Why deliver with Fantuan fd_deliver_why_header: "为什么成为饭团送餐员？", fd_deliver_why_text: "想要收入高？还想工作时间自由？成为饭团外卖送餐员就能满足您的需求！", fd_deliver_why_header1: "时间灵活", fd_deliver_why_text1: "自由选择上班时间，周一至周日随心选", fd_deliver_why_header2: "收入高", fd_deliver_why_text2: "海量订单，轻松通过软件接单，收入明细一目了然", fd_deliver_why_header3: "自选配送工具", fd_deliver_why_text3: "只需工卡，驾照和车辆，可选汽车或电动车，即可开始您的配送之旅。", // deliver meet fd_deliver_meet_header: "优秀送餐员介绍", fd_deliver_meet_text: "Life can be complicated but ordering food doesn't have to be.", // deliver get start fd_deliver_get_header: "立即申请", fd_deliver_get_text1: "时间灵活，轻松赚钱！填写表格立刻申请成为饭团", fd_deliver_get_text2: "送餐员，期待您的加入！", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Deliver // ------------------------------------- fd_deliver_become_button: "我要入驻", fd_deliver_become_title: "成为送餐员", fd_deliver_become_area: "地区", fd_deliver_become_area_select1: "Greater Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_area_select2: "Los Angeles", fd_deliver_become_area_select3: "Toronto", fd_deliver_become_name: "姓名", fd_deliver_become_name_ph1: "First Name", fd_deliver_become_name_ph2: "Last Name", fd_deliver_become_phone: "电话", fd_deliver_become_phone_ph: "Phone Number", fd_deliver_become_address: "地址", fd_deliver_become_address_street: "Street Address", fd_deliver_become_address_city: "City", fd_deliver_become_address_zip: "ZIP / Postal Code", fd_deliver_become_schedule_title: "服务区域", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name1: "大都市", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name2: "拉菲德", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name3: "市中心", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name4: "新西部", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name5: "海斯汀", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name6: "列治文", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name7: "Coquitlam", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name8: "Surrey", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name9: "Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_trans_title: "交通工具", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Car (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Electric Motorbike (rent)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Motorbike (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_hours_title: "送餐时间", fd_deliver_become_hours_time01: "周一 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time02: "周二 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time03: "周三 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time04: "周四 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time05: "周五 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time06: "周六 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time07: "周日 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time08: "周一 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time09: "周二 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time10: "周三 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time11: "周四 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time12: "周五 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time13: "周六 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time14: "周日 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_desc: "申请描述", fd_deliver_become_inputcode: "输入验证码", fd_deliver_become_submit: "提交", fd_deliver_become_close: "关闭", // Delivery - FAQ // -------------- // FAQ fd_faq_header: "FAQ", fd_faq_text: "还有疑问？我们为您解答！我们列出了常见的一些问题，请在下方查找相应信息。如未能解答您的疑问，请联络当地饭团工作人员。", // FAQ general fd_faq_general_title: "一般性问题", fd_faq_general_h1: "1、如何联系客服解决问题？", fd_faq_general_p1: "联系客服，请拨打电话778-833-1131，客服周一至周日全天在线，24小时都有专人解决您的问题。", fd_faq_general_h2: "2、哪些商家有优惠？都有些什么优惠？", fd_faq_general_p2: "优惠信息可以在饭团点餐主页查看，也可以关注各区公众号了解最新优惠活动。", fd_faq_general_h3: "3、预计送达的时间为什么与我实际收餐的时间不符？", fd_faq_general_p3: "饭团平均配送时间为30分钟左右，影响配送速度的不确定因素主要有：", fd_faq_general_p31: "1）订单排队受理：我们需按下单的先后次序安排您的订单；", fd_faq_general_p32: "2）商家出餐速度：因某些餐品的制作特性，餐品的数量多，偶尔会有非常长时间的等餐过程；餐馆一般需要20分钟以上的时间。", fd_faq_general_p33: "3）恶劣天气：特殊天气时行车环境恶化，导致配送效率下降；", fd_faq_general_p34: "4）配送意外：偶尔路上会发生撞车，修路，堵车等原因导致配送时间增长。", fd_faq_general_p35: "我们无法掌握所有因素，希望能得到您的谅解和支持。提前下单或预订，将有效地保障您的用餐时间要求。

", fd_faq_general_h4: "4、送过来的餐品有问题怎么解决？", fd_faq_general_p4: "如遇餐品有任何问题请及时联系通知客服处理， 通常分为两种情况，若是送餐服务过程中产生的问题则由饭团进行赔偿协商，例如餐品洒漏严重。 若是餐品质量出现问题，客服会帮助您联系商家进行协商或赔偿处理。", fd_faq_general_h5: "5、饭团提供发票吗？", fd_faq_general_p5: "如需订单的发票/收据，可以在历史订单里找到需要发票/收据的订单，点开之后会看到一个需要小票的字样 ，选择并填写您的邮箱，小票就会直接发送到指定邮箱。", // FAQ account fd_faq_account_title: "账号", // fd_faq_account_h1: "", // fd_faq_account_p1: "", // FAQ delivery staff fd_faq_deliver_title: "送餐员", fd_faq_deliver_h1: "1、如何成为饭团送餐员？", fd_faq_deliver_p1: "成为饭团送餐员请前往http://xxxxx填写申请。", fd_faq_deliver_h2: "2、在饭团送餐是用什么交通工具？需要自备吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p2: "饭团送餐员需要自备交通工具，汽车，自行车，电单车均可。您也可以租赁饭团提供的电单车。", fd_faq_deliver_h3: "3、在饭团送餐需要工卡吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p3: "需要，必须有合法工卡和sin number才能成为饭团送餐员。", fd_faq_deliver_h4: "4、我是国际学生，可以成为饭团送餐员吗？", fd_faq_deliver_p4: "只要有有效工签，工卡和sin number即可成为饭团送餐员。", // FAQ refunds fd_faq_refunds_title: "退款", fd_faq_refunds_h1: "1、如何查看我的退款？", fd_faq_refunds_p1: "退款方式具体以银行的结算方式为准，您可以查询银行的消费记录，根据银行不同退款方式会有不同，有的银行会给您退款，有的会直接在之前的订单金额上做修正。", fd_faq_refunds_h2: "2、退还的优惠券使用期限是多久？", fd_faq_refunds_p2: "退还的优惠券有效期为发放当日起计一年有效。", // FAQ partner fd_faq_partner_title: "商家", fd_faq_partner_h1: "1、如何入驻饭团平台？", fd_faq_partner_p1: "商家入驻请前往http:xxxxx填写申请，您也可以拨打相应城市市场部门电话。", fd_faq_partner_h2: "2、签约后是否有专人解答我的问题？", fd_faq_partner_p2: "我们会有专门负责餐厅合作以及市场运营的同事与餐厅联系，为餐厅解答所有的问题。后期也会与餐厅保持联系，任何问题都可以随时沟通。", fd_faq_partner_h3: "3、如何参与平台的优惠活动？", fd_faq_partner_p3: "饭团每月都会有相应的线上或者线下的活动。活动种类不限。若想要参与饭团的活动，只需找到负责您区域的市场运营同事询问即可。", // FAQ payment fd_faq_payment_title: "支付", fd_faq_payment_h1: "1、饭团支持哪些支付方式？", fd_faq_payment_p1: "饭团接受以下支付方式：", fd_faq_payment_p11: "- 现金", fd_faq_payment_p12: "- interac online可以支持debit card在线支付", fd_faq_payment_p13: "- 在线支付，接受visa卡, master卡", fd_faq_payment_p14: "- 微信支付", fd_faq_payment_p15: "- 支付宝（仅限饭团App内使用）", fd_faq_payment_h2: "2、Debit卡为什么总是无法成功支付？", fd_faq_payment_p2: "请确认您的卡上是否有Visa或MasterCard字样，如果有的话需要选择Visa/Mastercard支付方式。", // FAQ membership points fd_faq_member_title: "会员积分", fd_faq_member_h1: "1、会员积分怎么得到？", fd_faq_member_p1: "1）成功下单后，即可获得与点餐金额相等的积分；", fd_faq_member_p11: "2）进入点餐界面右下角点击“账户”，选择“赚积分”获取相应积分；", fd_faq_member_p12: "3）进入饭团点评写下餐厅点评亦可获得相应积分", fd_faq_member_h2: "2、积分有什么用？", fd_faq_member_p2: "进入点餐界面点击右下角“账户”，选择“积分”即可以相应积分兑换积分商城的礼品。", // Dianping (点评) // ============== // header of dianping dp_header_partner: "商务合作", dp_header_foodinfo: "美食资讯", dp_header_language: "English", // Footer of dianping dp_footer_fantuan: "饭团集团",
